TopicTitle: jokes aside did Green Iron Crown get deleted

Articles.Content:
jokes aside did Green Iron Crown's account get deleted, i know the account was made for fun. but when i look through the old/closed threads, all i see is this guest account? 

![2SGThh7.png](http://i.imgur.com/2SGThh7.png)

thanks for your time. 

~crunch~ 

 el psy congroo
Yes, the account was deleted once the negative rep was negated.

We only had the idea to merge GIC into RIC after the fact.

Though that might have made him Greyish-Brown Iron Crown.

> 
> We only had the idea to merge GIC into RIC after the fact.
> Though that might have made him Greyish-Brown Iron Crown.

You guys think you're fooling us.

Look at Red Iron Crowns name.

What color is it? 

That's right.
Why is his rep bar white? He has no rep!!!

No, he's just a part of the White Bar Group, like me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127476-Say-Hello-to-the-White-Bar-Group%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127476-Say-Hello-to-the-White-Bar-Group%21)
